title: What’s the Best Way to Prepare Food? | Compilation
description:
Thanks MEL Science for sponsoring this video! Use the code “scishow” for 50% off the first month of any MEL Science subscriptions: https://melscience.com/sBLa/

From frying and baking, to zapping and roasting, here are a few scientifically backed dos and don’ts of food cookery.



Hosted by: Stefan Chin (he/him)

SciShow is on TikTok!  Check us out at https://www.tiktok.com/@scishow
